rev.diff:
Line 32: Line 32:
==Note==
==Note==
â
[[File:TomandJerryTitleCard2.jpg|thumb|200px|right|Tom and Jerry title card used from 1954 to 1955, and continued to be used on 1954-1957 reissues of old cartoons.]]
 
* ''Mice Follies'' was the first appearance of the familiar blue Tom and Jerry title card (Note this cartoon still uses the old red MGM Cartoons logo, but will soon be replaced with the familiar blue logo). The blue version continued to be used until 1956, and also tacked on earlier Tom and Jerry cartooned that were reissued. Even after 1956 the blue card continued to be used on reissues until the studio finally closed in 1957 (though in a slightly modified form).
* ''Mice Follies'' was the first appearance of the familiar blue Tom and Jerry title card (Note this cartoon still uses the old red MGM Cartoons logo, but will soon be replaced with the familiar blue logo). The blue version continued to be used until 1956, and also tacked on earlier Tom and Jerry cartooned that were reissued. Even after 1956 the blue card continued to be used on reissues until the studio finally closed in 1957 (though in a slightly modified form).
